response.overview: Since 1975, Tina Barney has been producing large-scale photographs of family and friends. Her meticulous tableaux chronicle the complexity of interpersonal relationships. With her unique sense of wit and humor, she recounts her photographic evolution - from her introduction to the work of Toulouse Lautrec as a young girl in Paris to her eight-year tour creating portraits throughout Europe.
response.title: Tina Barney: Speaking of Art
